# Instructure UI (InstUI) - React Component Library

- version 10.24.1 

- Instructure UI (InstUI) is a comprehensive React component library.

## Documentation

### User Guides
#### Getting Started

- [Accessibility](https://instructure.design/pr-preview/pr-2109/markdowns/accessibility.md)
- [Theming components](https://instructure.design/pr-preview/pr-2109/markdowns/theming-components.md)
- [Usage](https://instructure.design/pr-preview/pr-2109/markdowns/usage.md)

#### Guides

- [Accessing the dom](https://instructure.design/pr-preview/pr-2109/markdowns/accessing-the-dom.md)

- [Focus management](https://instructure.design/pr-preview/pr-2109/markdowns/focus-management.md)
- [Form errors](https://instructure.design/pr-preview/pr-2109/markdowns/form-errors.md)
- [Layout spacing](https://instructure.design/pr-preview/pr-2109/markdowns/layout-spacing.md)
- [Module federation](https://instructure.design/pr-preview/pr-2109/markdowns/module-federation.md)
- [Server side rendering](https://instructure.design/pr-preview/pr-2109/markdowns/server-side-rendering.md)
- [Typography system](https://instructure.design/pr-preview/pr-2109/markdowns/typography-system.md)
